required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Itraconazole Effect Study of SHR2554 on Healthy Chinese Adult Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open, Single Does, Drug-drug Interaction Study to Investigate the Effects of Itraconazole on the Pharmacokinetics of Healthy Chinese Adult Subjects After Oral Administration of SHR2554 Tablets

brief_summary.textblock:
The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the effect of Itraconazole on pharmacokinetics of healthy Chinese adult subjects after oral administration of SHR2554 tablets.
The secondary objective of the study is to evaluate the safety of single dose of SHR2554 orally in healthy subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: SHR2554 50 mg QD on Day 1 and Day 8, Itraconazole 200 mg once daily (QD) from Study Day 4 - 12

arm_group.description: SHR2554 50 mg QD on Day 1 and Day 8, Itraconazole 200 mg once daily (QD) from Study Day 4 - 12

intervention.description: Single dose of oral administration of SHR2554 and Multiple dose of oral of Itraconazole Capsules

facility.name: Xiangya Hospital of Central South University
